name: Bacterial growth
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-10.png)

A scientific laboratory is studying the behavior of a certain species of bacteria.
Every 24 hours their number doubles.

Create a variable `bacteriaCount` and assign it the value `10000`.

Write the following command that doubles the existing value of the `bacteriaCount` variable.
